channel.title: Watch out for scammer
channel.description:
[b][u]below is the conversation i had with him/her[/u][/b]
JACK says: hi?
Fate says: Hello
JACK says: who are you?
Fate says: I know this is awkward
Fate says: but can you possibly wait 10 minutes
Fate says: all shall be explained ok?
JACK says: no problem
Fate says: just tad busy now i promise i will tell :)
Fate says: Ok back sorry about that
Fate says: Ill explain now
JACK says: ok
Fate says: Well im here to basically ask you if i can have your services
Fate says: You see, if your a rs player you should know about SixFeetUnder correct?
JACK says: no i dont what is it?
Fate says: He was the first player to discover the first dupe
Fate says: Anyways more to the point
Fate says: Hes developed a program called SF-Scape
Fate says: its semi private, you wont have heard of it
Fate says: Hes offering tests on a new script
Fate says: And ive been sent around to ask rs players who i know fully well cheat
Fate says: IF you'd like to know more about the program just tell me
JACK says: ye i would
Fate says: Ok ill get you a link now
Fate says: ITs contained in a .rar file
Fate says: You extract and run the program
Fate says: [b](this is where he sent me link to rapidshare ive removed it to prevent any curious people from going on there downloading what it was and possibly getting scammed)[/b]
Fate says: their you go
Fate says: It has a built in authent system with your own programmed id by ip
Fate says: so we can monitor your test
JACK says: good try lol but im not an idiot
JACK says: you like scamming?
Fate says: Im not a scammer.
Fate says: want the sf scape information?
JACK says: yes
Fate says: Sf-scape developed by SixFeetUnder/bumis/g0ne is a delphi based runescape macro. This bot was based on the private version of Autorune developed by apd/raw/josh.
Why is Sf-scape undetectable?
Simple, the way people were banned from runescape for using macros is that the time between each click was the same, to render that issue ive designed it to click randomly, it will not always click on a npc, it might pm a friend asking how he is? or what hes up to etc. Another reason people we detected as using a macro is the amount of time there account was logged into runescape. To render this issue, Sf-scape will log in for 15 hours a day at random times of the day/night.
What special features does this macro have?
Well, to be fair, it doesnt have special features, just unique ones such as pm reply, and public chat reply. It has over 4000 auto responces. If it has a reply, it will simply say "sorry no time to chat must be off" and run 3 load screens away, then go back.
Fate says:
Pking - It has a built in pkbot. On the minimap, it only shows people who can attack you. Green dot for lower levels, yellow for same level Red for higher levels. For those ddser's and rangers it also has a fancy little feature that when you go from anywepon to a DDS on switch it will automaticly be ready to special. while fighting If you have a mele wepon in yor hand, it will turn on and off the best prayer you have, giving you another little advantage. Fate says: And the pking is what you would be testing.
JACK says: well sorry to disappoint you but im not going to do it
Fate says: Thats fine
Fate says: Thanks for your time anyways
Fate says: Have a good Day/Night, dependant on your timezone
[b]im pretty sure he got my email from this site and could target any of you next, so just be careful and don't fall for it unless you want your runescape items stolen[/b]
[b]so watch out for aceoffate@gmail.com[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/9361/aceoffatena4.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Watch out for scammer
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk

may i ask why this is in the scar section?

Read full topic

item.title: Watch out for scammer

item.description:
@m4gma wrote:

Why are you afraid of scanning it? Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Watch out for scammer
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“freezepop5, post:4, topic:86485”][quote author=lilmatt56 link=topic=126902.msg1233808#msg1233808 date=1177822675]
what was the file he posted? did u scan it?
[/quote]
no i didnt scan it tbh i didnt want to go any where near it[/quote]
I’ll scan it for you. I have 3 firewalls and Kaspersky Anti-Virus with Norton Anti-Virus. So i will not allow it to connect through to the internet and send other information. I will send a Jotti’s scan with my very own virus scanners. Please send me the download link and i will have a proper scan.

Thank-you!

Read full topic

item.title: Watch out for scammer
item.dc:creator: @freezepop freezepop5
item.description:
@freezepop wrote:

what was the file he posted? did u scan it?

no i didnt scan it tbh i didnt want to go any where near it

item.title: Watch out for scammer
item.dc:creator: @motoguy985 motoguy985
item.description:
@motoguy985 wrote:

You should have schooled him and been like, Firstly Autorune was invented by Kaitnieks, Secondly The guy you said made the dupe, didn’t and only 6 people knew about it, third, you just read the website containing the “history” of the dupe. SO, go away nooblet

Read full topic

Sf-scape developed by SixFeetUnder/bumis/g0ne is a delphi based runescape

ive designed it to click randomly, it will not always click on a npc,
